name: lab4
description: * I add the new fucntion to remember the account and password for the user at local machine.  * Instead of using a word link to control "login in", " Sign Up" and "Log Out" sliding down, I decided to use a button to operate and initiate "toggling" function, to make it more easier to click * Also, add sequencial function animation for "remove" and "add" new items in the todo list.
